exam.title: Departamento de Idiomas. Escuela de Guerra | INGLÉS
exam.intro1: En las sucesivas presentaciones usted encontrará preguntas de tipo test relacionadas con la conversación que debe escuchar previamente en la parte izquierda de la misma.
exam.intro2: Después de escuchar la conversación en inglés deberá responder a una de las preguntas de la parte derecha.
exam.intro3: Gracias por su colaboración. A continuación podrá imprimir las respuestas que han sido seleccionadas, o bien imprimirlas en un archivo pdf para su entrega al profesor correspondiente.
exam.timeOver: Su tiempo ha terminado. Pulse finalizar e imprima sus respuestas

question.Question: 1. She is a cousin of my uncle Percy, who comes from Wales.

answers.answ1: A. My Uncle Percy is married to a Welsh woman.
answers.answ2: B. My cousin is also Welsh
answers.answ3: C. She is related to a Welsh uncle of mine.
answers.answ4: D. Both her uncle and his son come from Wales

question.Question: 2. The disease spread faster than the authorities thought it would.

answers.answ1: A. The authorities kept the disease under control
answers.answ2: B. The authorities' predictions about the disease were wrong.
answers.answ3: C. The authorities were fast to find the source of the disease.
answers.answ4: D. The authorities were quick to inform the population about the disease.

question.Question: 3. Mrs. Peters was offered $500 for her family heirloom.

answers.answ1: A. Mrs. Peters made an offer of $500 for the grandfather clock
answers.answ2: B. Mrs. Peters wanted to buy the grandfather clock for her family
answers.answ3: C. The grandfather clock Mrs. Peters inherited was sold for five hundred dollars
answers.answ4: D. Mrs. Peters was asked to sell her grandfather clock for five hundred dollars.
